nodes.text: The X-23 StarWorker was an intra-system space barge produced by the starship manufacturing corporation Incom, capable of carrying up to 5,000 metric tons of cargo in its 2,000 cubic meter bay.
Bereft of weapons, shields, and hyperdrive, the 38-meter long StarWorker had consumables enough to last a week, and could be crewed by only two sentients with a fifth-degree labor droid.
In 11 ABY, Wedge Antilles flew a StarWorker to the Yavin 4 Jedi Praxeum to offload supplies.

Pirates & Privateers uses a different picture for the X-23. This seems to be an error, as looks like an unknown space barge that appears in The Star Wars Sourcebook near of the X-23 description (the StarWorker has its own picture, however).

The stat block and description in the first edition of The Star Wars Sourcebook states the Starworker doesn't have an hyperdrive, however the stat block lists a NavComputer (for no use). This oddity repeats in further RPG sources.
